room_title: Escape room "Time-Traveling Jen" by Human vs Room in Bethlehem
review: We just did our first escape room and it was such a good time! The people there are friendly and seem to have as much excitement about you doing the room as you do. We had a group of 7 and did the Jen time traveler room. Everyone was busy figuring out clues and nobody was left standing around without working on a problem. You can ask for clues or try to solve the puzzles on your own. We will definitely be back to try out the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Time-Traveling Jen" by Human vs Room in Bethlehem
review: Went with a bridal party of 18 yesterday and everyone had a BLAST! The time travel room was awesome and the staff absolutely made sure we had a great time. Thank you for making our friend's bachelorette day special! I'll definitely be back.
